A '''Fighting Egg''' is a type of Pokémon Egg that can hatch Fighting-type Pokémon. ==Details== ===Hatch Table=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Kanto !! Johto !! Hoenn !! Sinnoh |- | Hitmonchan || | Tyrogue || Makuhita || Riolu |- | Hitmonlee || | || Meditite || |- | Machop || | || | || |- | Mankey || | || | || |} ===Acquisition=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Location !! Price |- | Saffron City || | 1000 [[Quest Points]] |- | Canalave City || | 1000 [[Quest Points]] |- | Cianwood City || | 1000 [[Quest Points]] |} {{Eggs}}
